title: Making Cannabis Shine
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Adrian Sedlin is founder and CEO of  Canndescent, a vertically integrated flower brand out of Santa Barbara, CA that offers a number of brands including Justice Joints, which donates 100% of all profits to social equity efforts. California's cannabis landscape suffers from oversupply and not enough legal retail, an unregulated grey market that's 2-3x the size of legal market. Incumbents know their way around; some will be bought by those with large balance sheets, some will head East. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
